tool_description: In the ever-evolving landscape of cryptocurrencies, the threat of theft looms large. For those unfortunate enough to fall victim to such incidents, the journey towards recovery can seem daunting. However, with the emergence of specialized crypto recovery services like Wizard Asset Recovery, hope is not lost. This article serves as a comprehensive guide, shedding light on the process of reclaiming lost assets, the expertise offered by recovery services, and the steps individuals can take to na...

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-recovery1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-recovery1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
